full_summary:
### CSAR 7 SPARES (Bid Solicitation)
#### Government of Canada Contract Opportunity
#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal
#### Solicitation Number: W8485-237300/A
#### Publication Date: November 2, 2022
#### Closing Date for Tender: December 13, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

The Department of National Defence seeks proposals from qualified suppliers for the procurement of CSAR 7 spare parts.

**Items and Quantities**

1. Personal Canopy Parachute (CPS-MS300-M2-CSAR7) - 10 units
2. PR-176 Canopy (CPS-CSAR7I-PR-176) - 28 units
3. PR-193 Canopy (CPS-CSAR7I-PR-193) - 5 units
4. SI-210 Canopy (CPS-CSAR7I-SI-210) - 3 units

**Delivery Location**

Deliveries must be made to the Centre Canadien de Parachute (CAAWC) Trenton.

**Tender Process**

Bidders are encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service. Bids must be received by the specified bid receiving unit no later than the closing date.

**Important Notes**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Suppliers proposing equivalent or substitute products must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number, and the NCAGE they are offering.

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact:
Debbie Bergeron
Debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca

**Terms and Conditions**

A copy of the bid solicitation document, including the terms and conditions, can be accessed through the following link:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/02/8e8043d2daf9c89f17be72341bd8975d/w8485-237300_a_csar_7_preq_17589177_bid_solicitation_en.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/02/468dd026f1a3b64ba90a83c589a840dc/w8485-237300_a_csar_7_preq_17589177_bid_solicitation_fr.pdf (French)    Item
